first_translate: so...
second_translate: …So?
label: so...

first_translate: ...are you not going to do it?
second_translate: Are you not going to get engaged?
label: ...when will you be setting the date...

first_translate: the engagement.
second_translate: Engagement.
label: ...for your engagement?

first_translate: the engagement...
second_translate: Engagement...?
label: my engagement...?

first_translate: yes, people usually get engaged...
second_translate: That's right, people usually get engaged...
label: right,  that's how it's normally done, isn’t it?

first_translate: I guess I’ll have to think about it now...
second_translate: Should I start thinking about it now?
label: I guess we'll have to start thinking about that now...

hangle: 피오나 영애는 늘 여러 의미로 느긋하네요….
first_translate: you’re always so laid-back in many ways, lady fiona...
second_translate: Lady Fiona, you’re always relaxed in so many ways...
label: you really are quite laid back in many ways, lady fiona...

first_translate: I was just thinking about whether I should break up with him or not!
second_translate: Not long ago, I was agonizing over whether to break up or not!
label: well, I was thinking about breaking up with him not too long ago...!

first_translate: there’s no need to rush.
second_translate: There’s no particular need to rush.
label: there's no reason to rush things.

first_translate: I’m not even sure if siegren is thinking about it...
second_translate: I'm not even sure if Siegren has even considered it.
label: I'm not sure if siegren has even been thinking about it.

first_translate: abel hasn’t even come to the capital yet.
second_translate: For now, Abel hasn’t even come to the capital.
label: and besides, abel isn't even here in the capital.

hangle: ‘저희 약혼할게요!’ 하면 무슨 반응이 나올지도 모르겠고.
first_translate: I don’t know how he’ll react if I say, “we’ll get engaged!”
second_translate: I have no idea how people will react if I say, "We're getting engaged!"
label: I don't  know how he'll react to me saying, "we're engaged!"

first_translate: siegren is not allowed to enter after 8 o’clock.
second_translate: No entry for Siegren after 8 o’clock.
label: No Entry for Siegren after 8 P.M.

first_translate: it’s almost time for me to leave.
second_translate: It’s almost curfew time.
label: I'll have to leave soon.

first_translate: I’ll get going.
second_translate: I'll head back.
label: good night.

first_translate: why is he following the rules so well?!
second_translate: Why is he being so diligent about following the rules?!
label: why are  you being so obedient?!

first_translate: 8 o’clock?!
second_translate: Eight o’clock already?!
label: 8 p.m.?!

first_translate: are we in middle school?
second_translate: What are you, middle schoolers?
label: what are we,  middle schoolers?!

first_translate: but come to think of it,
second_translate: But come to think of it,
label: come to think of it,

first_translate: if siegren and I get married...
second_translate: if Siegren and I get married...
label: if siegren and I really were to get married,

first_translate: you...
second_translate: who.
label: who said...

first_translate: ...will be your father-in-law, right?
second_translate: He's your father-in-law, right?
label: ...I’d be your father-in-law?!

first_translate: what are you thinking about?
second_translate: what are you thinking about?
label: what are  you thinking about?

first_translate: high society without the crown prince and empress.
second_translate: a peaceful high society without the crown prince and empress.
label: there's peace  in high society without the crown prince and the empress,

first_translate: oh...
second_translate: Oh...
label: oh...

first_translate: I should ask siegren if he’s okay with that first...
second_translate: I should check with Siegren first to see if he's fine with this.
label: I'll have to talk to siegren about this first.

first_translate: there are so many things to think about now.
second_translate: Various new concerns have arisen.
label: but there are still many new things to worry about.

first_translate: it’s nothing.
second_translate: it’s nothing.
label: it's nothing really.

first_translate: what?
second_translate: what's this?
label: what’s...

first_translate: cain ereze is flustered,
second_translate: cain ereze is flustered.
label: cain ereze seems quite flustered...

hangle: 그 앞에 선 건 대여섯 살은 차이 날 10대 후반의 소녀…
first_translate: and there’s a teenage girl standing in front of him who looks five or six years younger than him...
second_translate: And in front of him stands a girl in her late teens, who looks about five or six years younger.
label: ...in front of  that teenage girl who looks at least five years younger than him...

first_translate: who is she?
second_translate: Who is that?
label: who is she?

first_translate: she doesn’t look like an ordinary person.
second_translate: She clearly isn't of ordinary status.
label: she clearly doesn't look like a commoner,

first_translate: she’s not a noble lady I know.
second_translate: She’s not a noble lady I recognize.
label: but she's  not a noble lady I recognize either.

first_translate: could she be...
second_translate: No way...
label: hang on...

first_translate: ...his ex-girlfriend?
second_translate: She’s not his ex, is she?
label: is she... his former lover?

first_translate: if that’s true, it would be better for the world...
second_translate: It would be better for the world if they disappeared.
label: dun

first_translate: ...if they disappeared.
second_translate: It would be better for the world if they disappeared.
label: that would be for the greater good.

first_translate: y-your highness...!
second_translate: Your Highness, the Prince...!
label: y-your highness...!

hangle: 이제 훈련 시간이다. 뭘 하고 있지?
first_translate: it’s time for training. what are you doing?
second_translate: It's training time. What are you doing?
label: what do  you think you're doing when you’re supposed to be training?

first_translate: judging by his reaction, it must be true.
second_translate: Judging by his reaction, it must be true.
label: his reaction tells me my guess was right.

first_translate: it’s nice to meet you,
second_translate: It’s a pleasure to meet you.
label: greetings, your highness.

first_translate: although I’m not sure if I can say that.
second_translate: Would it be alright to say that?
label: I suppose  this is our first time meeting...

first_translate: hello,
second_translate: Hello.
label: hello,

first_translate: brother.
second_translate: Older Brother.
label: big brother.

first_translate: I’m the first princess.
second_translate: I'm the First Princess.
label: I am the first princess.

first_translate: please call me aria.
second_translate: Please call me Aria.
label: please call me aria.

first_translate: brother...?
second_translate: older brother...?
label: did she call me her brother...?

first_translate: that’s right.
second_translate: that’s right.
label: that's right.

first_translate: I’ve never seen her in person before.
second_translate: I’ve never seen her before.
label: it's my first time seeing her in person.

first_translate: she’s not the daughter of the empress.
second_translate: She was not a legitimate princess.
label: there was a princess in the direct imperial bloodline.

hangle: 하급 귀족 출신 황비의 소생이라 했던가.
first_translate: she’s the daughter of a concubine from a low-ranking noble family.
second_translate: She is the daughter of an empress consort from a low-ranking noble family.
label: I think her  mother was from a low-ranking noble family.

first_translate: oh!
second_translate: Oh!
label: oh!

first_translate: I’m sorry for interrupting your morning training, brother.
second_translate: I’m sorry for interrupting your morning training, brother.
label: I'm sorry for interrupting your morning training, your highness.

hangle: 예전 제 기사였던 케인 경과 이야기를 나누고 싶어서요.
first_translate: I wanted to talk to sir cain, who used to be my knight.
second_translate: I want to talk to Sir Cain, my former knight.
label: I was just talking to sir cain who used to be my personal guard.

first_translate: oh.
second_translate: Oh.
label: oh.

first_translate: you can take him if it’s just for a moment.
second_translate: You can take him if it’s just for a moment.
label: you may take  him away as long as you send him back quickly.

hangle: 케인은 황녀 궁의 기사였으니 주종 관계였군.
first_translate: cain was the princess’s knight, so they were in a master-servant relationship.
second_translate: cain was the princess’s knight, so it was a master-servant relationship.
label: cain used  to be a knight in  the princess's palace, so they must have  a master-servant relationship.

hangle: 케인이 아비인 에레즈 후작의 수족 노릇을 하지 않는다더니.
first_translate: I heard cain doesn’t do the bidding of his father, marquis ereze.
second_translate: Cain doesn’t act as his father, Marquis Ereze’s, right-hand man.
label: I heard cain wasn't acting as marquess ereze's hands and feet, though.

first_translate: y-your highness...
second_translate: y-your highness, princess...
label: y-your highness...

first_translate: is this the reason why?
second_translate: Was that the reason?
label: could this be the reason why?

first_translate: I don’t care even if she’s my half-sister.
second_translate: It doesn’t matter to me even if she’s my half-sister.
label: she may be  my half-sister,  but it doesn't make much difference  to me...

hangle: 어머니 외의 혈연은 없는 것과 마찬가지니까.
first_translate: my mother is the only family I have.
second_translate: It's as if I have no family except for my mother.
label: ...since my mother is the only one I consider as my own blood.

hangle: 하지만 나와 황태자, 어느 쪽의 편에도 아직 서지 않고
first_translate: but if the eldest son of the ereze family, who has not taken sides yet,
second_translate: but neither I nor the crown prince has taken a side yet,
label: but if house ereze’s eldest maintains his neutral stance...

hangle: 모호한 태도를 고수하는 에레즈의 장자가 끼어있다면…
first_translate: is involved, it could be a different story.
second_translate: If the heir of the Ereze family, who maintains an ambiguous stance, is involved...
label: ...and stays  in between the  crown prince and me without taking  either side,

first_translate: ...found a way.
second_translate: …might have found it.
label: ...an interesting new character.

first_translate: your sister?
second_translate: A sibling?
label: you have a little sister?

first_translate: yes, I heard you have a half-sister.
second_translate: Yes, I have a half-sibling.
label: yes, she’s my half-sister.

hangle: 원작에서는 제대로 등장한 장면도 없던 존재였는데.
first_translate: she didn’t even appear in the original story.
second_translate: She never had a proper appearance in the original story.
label: but she barely made an appearance.

hangle: 몸이 약하다며 나오지 않아 얼굴도 본적 없었는데.
first_translate: I’ve never seen her before because she never came out, saying she was sick.
second_translate: I had never seen her before because she never appeared, saying she was weak.
label: she hardly  reveals herself on account of her poor health,

first_translate: but I saw her walking around recently.
second_translate: She's been walking around lately.
label: but it seems like she's been out and about lately.

first_translate: you mean the first princess...?
second_translate: The first princess...?
label: you mean the first princess...?

first_translate: does that mean she’s healthy now? that’s good.
second_translate: does that mean she’s healthy now? that’s good.
label: I guess  that means she's better now, so good for her.

hangle: 글쎄, 처음부터 아픈 척을 했던 것일지도.
first_translate: well, she could have been pretending to be sick from the start.
second_translate: Well, she could have been pretending to be sick from the start.
label: who knows? maybe she was only pretending to be sick in the first place.

first_translate: the timing is too perfect.
second_translate: The timing aligns too well.
label: the timing is much too perfect.

first_translate: she started coming out when the empress and crown prince became quiet.
second_translate: She started making moves when the empress and crown prince lost influence.
label: she's only  active now that  the empress and the crown prince are lying low.

first_translate: that means...
second_translate: That means...
label: that means...

first_translate: ...she was watching the empress.
second_translate: She had been wary of the empress all along.
label: ...she could have been trying to keep the empress from noticing her.

first_translate: yes,
second_translate: Yeah.
label: well,

first_translate: she would have killed her if she got in her way.
second_translate: She would have killed her if she was deemed a nuisance.
label: she would have been killed if she angered the empress.

hangle: 의외로 이 황가에 직계 황족은 그리 많지 않았다.
first_translate: surprisingly, there aren’t many direct descendants in the imperial family.
second_translate: Surprisingly, there aren’t many direct royal family members in the imperial family.
label: there aren't as many direct descendants to the imperial throne as one might expect.

first_translate: usually, the women don’t live...
second_translate: Usually, until the children are born...
label: normally,  it's quite rare for a daughter to remain alive...

hangle: 여자가 살아 있는 경우가 거의 없어.
first_translate: ...until the children are born.
second_translate: Women rarely survive.
label: ...before the birth of a son.

hangle: 황제가 손을 댄 여자와 그 아이를 처리한 것이다.
first_translate: the empress took care of the women the emperor slept with and their children.
second_translate: The emperor took care of the women he was involved with and their children.
label: ...to get rid of the women the emperor had relations with, including their children.

hangle: 하지만 황비는 어쨌든 하급이라고 해도 귀족이고,
first_translate: but the concubine was a noble, even if she was from a low-ranking family,
second_translate: But the imperial consort was still a noble, even if she was from a low-ranking family.
label: even though an  imperial consort can  be a low-ranking noble, she is still a noble nonetheless.

hangle: 그렇다고 뒷배경은 없으니 살려 둔 모양이야.
first_translate: and she didn’t have any backing, so the empress let her live.
second_translate: And since she didn’t have any political backing, it seems they let her live.
label: it seems like  the empress kept her alive because she wasn't much of a threat.

hangle: 황자가 아닌 황녀였으니, 그냥 내버려 둔 거구나.
first_translate: she didn’t care because she was a princess, not a prince.
second_translate: She was simply left alone because she was a princess, not a prince.
label: she must have  left her alone since she was a princess and not a prince.

hangle: 게다가 납작 엎드려 있었다면 신경 쓸 가치도 없다 생각했겠지.
first_translate: and if she was lying low, the empress probably didn’t think she was worth worrying about.
second_translate: And if she completely kept her head down, they probably thought she wasn’t even worth paying attention to.
label: plus, if she  had grovelled at  the empress's feet, the empress wouldn't have felt the need to worry about her.

first_translate: the princess is smarter than I thought.
second_translate: The princess is smarter than I thought.
label: her highness may be more intelligent than you might think.

hangle: 눈치도 있고, 자존심을 굽히고 기어야 할 때도 알고 있다.
first_translate: she’s perceptive and knows when to swallow her pride.
second_translate: She’s perceptive and knows when to humble herself.
label: not only would she have tact, but she'd also know when to swallow her pride and kneel when needed.

first_translate: so,
second_translate: So,
label: so...

hangle: 새로운 세력 구도가 생겼다고 하는 거야?
first_translate: are you saying a new power structure has formed?
second_translate: Are you saying a new power structure has formed?
label: ...is that  why you're saying there's a new power dynamic?

first_translate: duke priscilla and marquis clovis.
second_translate: Duke Priscilla and Marquis Clovis.
label: marquess priscilla and marquess clovis...

hangle: 5 가문 중 중립을 지지하고 있는 귀족들이 수상해.
first_translate: the nobles who are neutral among the five families are suspicious.
second_translate: The nobles who support neutrality among the five families are suspicious.
label: ...are the two  neutral ones of  the five noble families, and that makes them suspicious.

first_translate: are they really neutral?
second_translate: Are they truly neutral?
label: do you think they really are neutral?

hangle: …그러네, 두 가문의 수장은 무리하게 중립을 지키고 있지.
first_translate: you’re right. the heads of the two families are trying hard to stay neutral.
second_translate: …you’re right. the heads of the two families are forcing themselves to stay neutral.
label: you're right.  the heads of two families have been trying too hard to maintain a neutral position.

hangle: 원작의 아렌트는 유니스에게 빠져, 지금과는 행보가 전혀 달랐다.
first_translate: in the original story, arendt was in love with eunice, so he acted differently from now.
second_translate: In the original story, Arendt was infatuated with Eunice, so his course of action was entirely different from now.
label: in the novel,  arendt falls for eunice, and his actions are quite different from what they  are now.

first_translate: the same goes for duke priscilla.
second_translate: the same goes for Duchess Priscilla.
label: the same is true for marquess priscilla.

first_translate: there is a possibility...
second_translate: There is also a possibility that they are aiming for another option.
label: there is definitely a chance that they are aiming...

first_translate: ...that they could choose a different option.
second_translate: There is certainly a possibility.
label: ...for a different outcome.

first_translate: if that’s true,
second_translate: If that assumption is true,
label: if my speculations are correct,

first_translate: we might have to nip it in the bud.
second_translate: we might have to nip it in the bud.
label: we may have to nip this in the bud.

first_translate: what do you want to do?
second_translate: what do you want to do?
label: what do  you want to do about it?

first_translate: ...want to wait and see.
second_translate: I want to observe a little longer.
label: ...want to wait and see what happens a bit more.

first_translate: really?
second_translate: Is that so?
label: really?

first_translate: then do as you wish.
second_translate: then do as you wish.
label: then go ahead.

first_translate: he doesn’t seem to care much.
second_translate: He doesn’t seem to care as much as I thought.
label: you don't seem as worried about it as I thought you’d be.

hangle: 아마 너나 나나 권력에 미련이 없기 때문 아닐까.
first_translate: it’s probably because neither of us is interested in power.
second_translate: It’s probably because neither of us has any lingering attachment to power.
label: that's probably because neither of us has an interest in gaining power.

first_translate: let’s see, the next letter is...
second_translate: Let's see, the next letter...
label: let's take  a look at the next letter...

first_translate: I just want you to be happy.
second_translate: I just want you to be happy.
label: besides, all I want is your happiness.

first_translate: but we don’t know what they’re thinking,
second_translate: But we never know what their true intentions are.
label: but still,  since we don't know what they want,

first_translate: so I might have to discuss it with abel...
second_translate: I might have to consult with Abel...
label: we may have to discuss this with abel...

first_translate: fiona?
second_translate: fiona?
label: fiona?

first_translate: they say...
second_translate: ...Abel...
label: this says that abel...

first_translate: ...abel is missing...
second_translate: ...Abel is missing...
label: ...has gone missing.
